p: The polyphenols identified in NPRE were previously reported [ 18]. Briefly, catechin, eryodictiol-7-O-glucoside, gallic acid, and protocatechuic acid were the most abundant compounds, followed by caffeic acid. The total amount of polyphenols was 8.1 mg/100 g fresh weight of NPRE. The identification and quantification of the polyphenols present in NPRE was useful to prepare NP MIX.
